description: '''Emo rap''' is a subgenre of [[Hip hop music|hip hop]] with influence from [[emo]]. Originating in the [[SoundCloud rap]] scene in the mid-2010s, the genre fuses characteristics of hip hop music, such as trap-style beats with vocals that are usually sung. Some of the most prominent artists in the genre were [[Lil Peep]], [[XXXTentacion]], and [[Juice Wrld]].
